ygData.msgSnippet: ... FZ s wrist comp beeps, and he looks down at it, the scanner reports from the Iron Fist coming up. He frowns, watching the Oblivion flying into the ocean.

::FZ::

FZ's wrist comp beeps, and he looks down at it, the scanner reports from the Iron Fist coming up. He frowns, watching the Oblivion flying into the ocean. He'd have to keep track of it.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> Deep in the frozen continent know as Antartica, A purple portal 
> appears. Exiting the portal is the Violator, which seems to be in far 
> worse of a condition then it was before. All over te outside of ship 
> electricity crackles as explosions occur near the rear of the ship. 
> Inside, Vile struggles with the controls of the Violator trying to 
> regain control of it as it barrels towards the face of the mountain. 
> 
> Vile: "Damn it! The activating of the gate proved to be too much for 
> the ship with its current damages. Skywarp, Methos help me pull up."
> 
> The two X-Predacons nod and at their stations pull down on two 
> joysticks. The combined effort worked, the ship flew up the face of 
> the montain narrowly escaping what seemed to be a certain collision. 
> As the ship flew up another explosion occured destroying two of the 
> ships engines sending all three of the X-Preds to the ground. As Vile 
> got up he looked in horror as the ship barreled down towards a sheet 
> of ice. Quickly he opened a transmission to everyone on the ship.
> 
> Vile: "All men brace form impact were going to crash!"
> 
> As if on cue the massive ship slammed down against the sheet of ice 
> below it and began to skid across the ice. Once it came to a stop 
> Vile stood and looked around, suddenly the ship began to tremble as 
> the ice beneath it began to crack under the ships weight. a moment 
> later the ice gave way and shattered sending everyone on the ship 
> flying into the air as if there was no gravity. As the ship continued 
> its plunge Vile struggled and pressed a red button causing the ships 
> remaining thrusters to go online. Outside the back of the ship lit up 
> as three thrusters activated and slowed the ships descent before it 
> landed on a large rock surrounded by hot springs with a loud crash. 
> This sent all members of the Vile Force back down onto the ships 
> floors with a loud crash...
> 
> Elsewhere, above Alliance Island(you know the alliances base), The 
> Infecticon ship the Oblivion floats harmlessly unseen to all scanners 
> and eyes. A moment later the ship dephase shifts making it visible to 
> scanners and eyes again. Inside Frostbite sits with Blight by her 
> side.
> 
> Frostbite: "Bring us into the ocean. We shall let the seas protect us 
> from all and then begin "Operation: Fury." The fools on the island 
> below wont have a clue of what is going on until it is too late."
> 
> Frostbite laughs evily as the Infecticon ship flys about 2 miles from 
> the Alliance base and begins to descend down into the depths of the 
> ocean.
